meanings.definition: A rich chocolate mixture used in confectionery for coating or filling cakes and pastries.
meanings.sent1: The baker spread ganache on top of the cake.
meanings.sent2: I love the taste of ganache on my cupcakes.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child tried to sneak a taste of the ganache.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as smooth as ganache, soothing everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The ganache melted in my mouth, leaving a delightful chocolatey flavor.

meanings.definition: To cover or fill with ganache.
meanings.sent1: She ganached the cupcakes with a thick layer of chocolate.
meanings.sent2: The chef ganaches the pastries with precision and care.
meanings.sent3: He ganaches the desserts as if he's painting a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The artist ganached the cake, turning it into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: Ganaching the cookies made them look irresistible and delicious.
